ComicInfo.Title: Episode 5: Celephais
ComicInfo.Summary:
An adaptation of H.P. Lovecraft's The Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath unlike anything you've read before.
For the first time since his journey began, Randolph Carter finds safety. But the comforts and luxuries offered to him are not enough to quiet the calls of the place he has seen in his dreams. Will he throw it all away to continue on a journey that may more than likely lead to his end?
As a bonus, also includes the original prose story!
